name: Bookmarklets
body: # Bookmarklets All Bookmarklets are crunched with [Bookmarklet Cruncher](http://ted.mielczarek.org/code/mozilla/bookmarklet.html) To add a bookmarklet, create a new bookmark and paste one of these as the link. ## Gitlab Code Review Block Toggle `Enable Code Block Toggle`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
